message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You can have less, I'll take more this time!
I'll take a bit more this time, but still want to keep it relatively close. Your turn!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
Back to 50/50. I'm not getting any younger, let's make a deal!
